verses.verse: A Psalm; a Song at the Dedication of the House. A Psalm of David. I will extol <S%H7311><s%> thee <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah; For thou hast raised me up <S%H1802><s%>, And hast not made my foes <S%H341><s%> to rejoice over me <S%H8055><s%>.
O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, I cried <S%H7768><s%> unto thee <S%H7495><s%>, and thou hast healed me.

O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, thou hast brought up <S%H5927><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from Sheol <S%H7585><s%>; Thou hast kept me alive <S%H2421><s%>, that I should not go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit <S%H953><s%>.
Sing <S%H2167><s%> praise unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, O ye saints <S%H2623><s%> of his <S%H3034><s%>, And give thanks to his holy <S%H6944><s%> memorial name <S%H2143><s%>.

For his anger <S%H639><s%> is but for a moment <S%H7281><s%>; His favor <S%H7522><s%> is for a life-time <S%H2416><s%>: Weeping <S%H1065><s%> may tarry <S%H3885><s%> for the night <S%H6153><s%>, But joy <S%H7440><s%> cometh in the morning <S%H1242><s%>.
As for me <S%H559><s%>, I said in my prosperity <S%H7959><s%>, I shall never <S%H5769><s%> be moved <S%H4131><s%>.

Thou <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, of thy favor <S%H7522><s%> hadst made my mountain <S%H2042><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> strong <S%H5797><s%>. Thou didst hide <S%H5641><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%>; I was troubled <S%H926><s%>.
I cried <S%H7121><s%> to thee <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah; And unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> I made supplication <S%H2603><s%>:

What profit <S%H1215><s%> is there in my blood <S%H1818><s%>, when I go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit <S%H7845><s%>? Shall the dust <S%H6083><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> thee <S%H5046><s%>? shall it declare thy truth <S%H571><s%>?
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and have mercy <S%H2603><s%> upon me <S%H3068><s%>: Jehovah, be thou my helper <S%H5826><s%>.

Thou hast turned <S%H2015><s%> for me my mourning <S%H4553><s%> into dancing <S%H4234><s%>; Thou hast loosed <S%H6605><s%> my sackcloth <S%H8242><s%>, and girded <S%H247><s%> me with gladness <S%H8057><s%>;

To the end that my glory <S%H3519><s%> may sing <S%H2167><s%> praise to thee <S%H1826><s%>, and not be silent. O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto thee for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
